abstract: Swiss skier Lara Gut gains on leader Lindsey Vonn in overall World Cup standings with second place finish in super-g in La Thuile, Italy; other winter sports news noted.
lead_paragraph: The battle for the World Cup overall title raged on as Switzerland’s Lara Gut outpaced the American Lindsey Vonn in the super-G in La Thuile, Italy, on Sunday to trim the gap at the top of the standings to 23 points.

headline.main: Lara Gut Cuts Lindsey Vonn’s Lead in World Cup Standings
headline.print_headline: Swiss Skier Cuts Vonn’s Lead in World Cup Standings

snippet: The battle for the World Cup overall title raged on as Switzerland’s Lara Gut outpaced the American Lindsey Vonn in the super-G in La Thuile, Italy, on Sunday to trim the gap at the top of the standings to 23 points.
